creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Knitted bag in multi-colored stripes and geometric and zoomorphic (horse and birds) patterns; strap and 4 tassels of varying colors on each side.
dimension:
11 x 12 1/2 in. (27.94 x 31.75 cm) (not including strap or tassles)
43 x 1 1/4 in. (109.22 x 3.18 cm) (object part, Strap)
title: Man's bag
